data.title: New Emergency Regulation for Cannabis Distributors and Retailers Requires California Cannabis Track-and-Trace
data.excerpt: The California Department of Tax and Fee Administration (CDTFA) recently adopted emergency Regulation 3702, California Cannabis Track-and-Trace, which requires distributors and retailers to enter the wholesale cost and the retail selling price of cannabis or cannabis products into the California Cannabis Track-and-Trace (CCTT) system.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California department of tax and fee administration
